name: kernel-dev-server

scripts.docker:local: npm run docker:build && npm run docker:run

kernel:acceptance: 1) docker:build must build the image from the kernel directory: `npm run docker:build` (from kernel/).
2) docker:run must start the image and allow health checks: `POSTGRES_URL=... npm run docker:run` -> `curl /health` returns {status:'ok'}.
3) docker:local is a convenience wrapper: `npm run docker:local` builds and runs the image.
4) npm run build and npm run start must function correctly inside the container: `node dist/server.js` starts the server.
